item.title: Thinking In Bets
item.description: ğŸ“ Notes â„¹ï¸ About In Super Bowl XLIX, Seahawks coach Pete Carroll made one of the most controversial calls in football history: With 26 seconds remaining, and trailing by four at the Patriots’ one-yard line, he called for a pass instead of a hand off to his star running back.
